StringTable.Label: DreadLords_DreadLords_Dec
StringTable.String: A dormant Dread Lord colony has awoken. Stop them before they become too powerful and wipe out all life in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: DreadLords_DreadLords_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A dormant Dread Lord colony has awoken. Stop them before they become too powerful and wipe out all life in the galaxy.
